note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices.
title: Plastic waste emitted to the ocean per capita vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: A country's total does not include waste that is exported overseas, which may be at higher risk of entering the ocean.

display.name: Per capita plastic waste emitted to the ocean

sourceDesc: Meijer et al. (2021); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
